title: FS/or T T206 Cobb Green Background PSA 3
author: jtschantz

posts.post_title: FS/or T T206 Cobb Green Background PSA 3
posts.post_content: I have a red portrait PSA 3 listed in my other post that reads "green portrait"..sorry about that..my first time selling on Net54..Here is the scan of the green portrait...asking $1500 for the green, $850 for the Red, and $1300 for the Sov. Bat on SGC 4 Cobb
PM sent on Red and Green.
All three Cobbs are sold...thanks for all of the interest!  I think I am going to give up ebay and start listing here!
